summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff discussing the status of editing a document related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails indicate they are working on markup and edits, with one person stating they are 'almost done with Maxwell' and coordinating on combining comments.

events.title: Email coordination on Maxwell document edits
events.description: US Attorney's Office staff exchange emails about their progress on editing a document related to Ghislaine Maxwell, discussing markups, edits from the Solicitor General's office, and whether to combine their comments.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject of discussion is editing a document related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
One email states 'I am almost done with Maxwell', indicating active work on her case in May 2020.
The emails reference edits from the Solicitor General's office, suggesting high-level review.
The coordination involves combining markups and comments on the Maxwell-related document.
